q: Although the investigators were initially recruited prior to the announcement of Andy Coulson 's departure, the events of the past week have added to the determination to gather information that could embarrass Ed Miliband and senior members of his staff. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said.
